description: Deep web research on tutor systems (M0+ modules, engines, and integrations) with evidence-backed gaps and proposals.

userStories.title: Create tutor system inventory
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a complete inventory of tutor systems, modules, and engines so I can see the full landscape.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Modules, Engines, Data Inputs, Data Outputs, Primary Docs
List evidence paths for each item

userStories.title: Map module files
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a module-to-file map to quickly locate M0+ documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: List each module (M0, M1, ...) with repo paths

userStories.title: Map engine files
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want an engine-to-file map so I can trace behavior to code and docs.
acceptanceCriteria: List each engine with repo paths and key entrypoints

userStories.title: Create dataflow map
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a dataflow map to understand how logs, RAG, and outputs move across systems.
acceptanceCriteria: Include inputs, transformations, and outputs for each major step

userStories.title: Create run loop map
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a loop map (plan?learn?log?review) tied to files and UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Include phases and file paths for each phase

userStories.title: Map question lifecycle
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a question lifecycle map to see where questions are generated, answered, and used.
acceptanceCriteria: Include where questions are stored and referenced

userStories.title: Map proposal lifecycle
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a proposal lifecycle map to see promotion_queue, approvals, and outcomes.
acceptanceCriteria: Include file paths and DB tables if used

userStories.title: Map system health pipeline
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a system health map to see health inputs, outputs, and usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Include health signals and consuming surfaces

userStories.title: Inventory evaluation metrics
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want an inventory of evaluation metrics to understand how performance is measured.
acceptanceCriteria: List each metric with evidence paths

userStories.title: Inventory automation toggles
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a list of automation toggles and safe_mode flags to avoid unintended behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Include where each toggle is stored and surfaced

userStories.title: Research pedagogy for M0
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want web research on best practices relevant to M0 so I can compare with our SOP.

userStories.title: Audit M0 against best practices
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want an audit of M0 vs research to identify gaps.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Current Behavior, Evidence Paths, Gaps

userStories.title: Create M0 module dossier
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a dossier for M0 that summarizes purpose and improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Purpose, Inputs/Outputs, Improvement Candidates

userStories.title: Propose M0 improvements
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want concrete improvement proposals for M0 based on evidence.
acceptanceCriteria: List at least 3 proposals with rationale and sources
